rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 09, 09-1, 09-4}
Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 09, 09-1}
Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 09, 09-1}

description: Topics for seminar presentation are selected in consultation with the coordinator.  A list of possible topics will be distributed but students are encouraged to propose subjects of interest to them, based in their own discipline.  Students present one paper, act as formal discussant on another, and are expected to engage in discussion of others.
